text: Looks like plots made with the RCall R string macro don't appear in Pluto.  Last I checked, they appear in Jupyter.  Is it likely due to a missing show method in RCall?

elements.text: Looks like plots made with the RCall R string macro don't appear in Pluto.  Last I checked, they appear in Jupyter.  Is it likely due to a missing show method in RCall?

text: I think there's a general issue with RCall macros, I once got around it by using the function rather than macro versions of calls, but that can get unwieldy

text: Hmm, I'll look into when I have some time
